name: Sprint Burnout
description: Ever since I was playing Lego Dimensions, I downloaded the midway arcade level pack, and played all of the old 1980 games like Spy Hunter, Defender, Robotron, and Sprint. I decided to make Robotron, but I decided to make a new Sprint game. Instead of racing against 3 A.I. drivers, you need to beat the timer before it hits zero. There are three medals for every lap to complete 3=bronze medal, 5=silver medal, 7=gold medal. Can you beat the Clock? I'm Striker from CrashFM. Up arrow- Gas, left and right arrows- steering, and down arrow to reverse. Just a side note I didn't have the time to make the medals in the game sorry, but you can picture yourself as a winner.
